attributes.action: Ban immitation guns & knives being sold in high street stores
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the recent spate of knive attacks on teenagers & the ever increasing use of guns on our streets, we were shocked to fined the amout of immitation knives & guns that are for sale in our local shops, & are there for not surprised to fined that there has been a sharp increase in this kind of attack, so we ask the Prime Minister to ban the sale of immitation guns & knives in our high street stores.
